about.intro: Cardano's on-chain treasury (part of the Voltaire governance era) currently holds funds in ADA only. However, there is growing interest in allowing the treasury to support multiple assets. This initiative aims to outline the motivation and objectives as well as the planned steps ahead towards the establishment of a Cardano multi asset treasury.

cards.title: Purpose
cards.content: To improve Treasury sustainability by introducing a Multi Asset Treasury, allowing the Cardano Treasury to not only receive and distribute Ada but to handle a wide range of assets.

cards.title: Features
cards.content: CMAT will introduce specific features which ensure a secure and stable management of treasury assets, while staying fully compatible to Cardano onchain governance (CIP1694)

cards.title: Benefits
cards.content: By implementing CMAT, the Treasury enables a wide range of economic possibilities and yet untapped opportunities

roadmap.name: IDEATION
roadmap.description: Initial thoughts and documents to introduce the concept of a multi asset treasury.

tasks.title: Draft & Publish CMAT Forum post
tasks.description: Draft & publish an initial CMAT introduction post on the Cardano Forum
tasks.additionalContent:
Context & Rationale

This forum post serves as the initial public introduction to the Cardano Multi-Asset Treasury (CMAT) initiative, providing the community with background information and the motivation behind the proposal.

Key Objectives

  • Raise awareness about the limitations of the current ADA-only treasury
  • Present the benefits of multi-asset treasury support
  • Gather community feedback and concerns
  • Build consensus around the initiative

Community Response

The post received significant engagement from the Cardano community, with constructive feedback and questions that helped shape the subsequent CPS development.
